definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: I figured out this problem without any effort.
sentences.chinese: 我毫不費力地解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: Lift your voice so that everyone can hear you with ease.
sentences.chinese: 把嗓門提高，讓大家都能毫不費力地聽清你的話。

sentences.english: I work out the problem without a diffcult.
sentences.chinese: 我毫不費力地解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: I can easily finish the work.
sentences.chinese: 我可以毫不費力地完成這工作。

sentences.english: With the help of the enthusiast, I had no difficult finding his home.
sentences.chinese: 在這個熱心人的幫助下，我毫不費力地找到了他的家。

sentences.english: So he effortlessly went to the team at the top.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他毫不費力地就走到了隊毋棠最前面。

sentences.english: He had little difficulty in talking the slanderer down.
sentences.chinese: 他以事實和數字爲後盾毫不費力地駁倒了誹謗者。

sentences.english: I'm at work in five-inch heels and perfectly able to do my job.
sentences.chinese: 我現在就穿着5英寸的高跟鞋在工作，而且毫不費力。

sentences.english: The wind blew stronger, and the little boat rampaged along effortlessly .
sentences.chinese: 風颳得更猛烈了，小船毫不費力地飛速行駛。

sentences.english: He jumped the wall with ease.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不費力地跳過了那堵牆。

sentences.english: Now, these three large principles are not always easy to advance at once.
sentences.chinese: 這三大原則並非總是能夠毫不費力地同時得到促進。

sentences.english: He creates effortlessly through his word and through his will.
sentences.chinese: 通過自己的意願，毫不費力的創造一切。

sentences.english: Most Hou the spot a young girl nowise and hard to tacklely become champion.
sentences.chinese: 最後現場一名少女毫不費力地獲得勝利。

sentences.english: The actor coasted to stardom on his good looks.
sentences.chinese: 這位男演員靠自己長得漂亮而毫不費力地成了明星。

sentences.english: I know 10 no-sweat ways to buff up your bod.
sentences.chinese: 我知道十種毫不費力的鍛鍊身體方法。

sentences.english: it enables it to get its food with very little effort, no more effort than one bite.
sentences.chinese: 蛇有了毒液就能夠毫不費力地咬上一口獵到的食物。
